an9.42:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an9.42:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi.
an9.42:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an9.42:3.1: Katamo, āvuso, sambādho, katamo sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā”ti?
an9.42:3.4: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
an9.42:3.8: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
an9.42:3.9: Ime kho, āvuso, pañca kāmaguṇā sambādho vutto bhagavatā.
an9.42:4.1: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:4.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:4.5: Yadeva tattha vitakkavicārā aniruddhā honti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:5.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:5.5: Yadeva tattha pīti aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:6.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:6.5: Yadeva tattha upekkhāsukhaṃ aniruddhaṃ hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:7.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:7.5: Yadeva tattha rūpasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:8.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:8.5: Yadeva tattha ākāsānañcāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:9.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:9.5: Yadeva tattha viññāṇañcāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:10.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:10.5: Yadeva tattha ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:11.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.42:11.5: Yadeva tattha nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā aniruddhā hoti, ayamettha sambādho.
an9.42:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.42:12.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, sambādhe okāsādhigamo vutto bhagavatā nippariyāyenā”ti.
